title: The Law of Love With God - Novel Updates
tags: Beautiful Female Lead   Character Growth   Comedic Undertone   Cunning Protagonist   Cute Protagonist   Devoted Love Interests   European Ambience   Evil Gods   Family   Female Protagonist   God-human Relationship   Godly Powers   Gods   Handsome Male Lead   Power Couple   Saints   Siblings   Slow Growth at Start   Slow Romance   Transmigration
author: 翡
description:
Lucia had to go to church with her mother every week and pray for two hours straight after transmigrating into another world.

Her thoughts were in turmoil and she was in an uncomfortable situation.

Due to her impatience, she ran into the confession room. Lucia spoke mischievously.

“Let me tell you, it’s better to rely on yourself rather than believe in God.”

“My mother prays every day, but I don’t see her getting rich.”

God, who happens to arrive by chance: ???>
